PowerShellStep.Title: Stop Processes (v3)

Package.Description:
Anaconda Enterprise is an enterprise-ready, secure and scalable data science platform that empowers teams to govern data science assets, collaborate and deploy data science projects. - Easily deploy your projects into interactive data applications, live notebooks and machine learning models with APIs. - Share those applications with colleagues and collaborators. - Manage your data science assets: notebooks, packages, environments and projects in an integrated data science experience.
Home Page - https://www.anaconda.com/
Installation Download - https://www.anaconda.com/distribution/#download-section
Installation Documentation - https://docs.anaconda.com/anaconda/install/windows/ - https://docs.anaconda.com/anaconda/install/silent-mode/
Other Useful Resources
Package.Name: Anaconda (v1r1) (v2019.07)
